document_data.mainbody:
Meldonder Nurian served as "Lord of the Waves" in Melvaunt around 1367 DR and 1373.
Meldonder was an imposing young man whos hair had turned white prematurely.
As Lord of the Waves Meldonder was responsible for the welfare of Melvaunts navy. In 1367 DR the navy consisted of twelve vessels with another four under construction.
